name: Mage Hand Legerdemain
description: Starting at 3rd level, when you cast Mage Hand, you can make the spectral hand invisible, and you can perform additional tasks with it: you can stow one object the hand is holding in a container worn or carried by another creature, retrieve an object in a container worn or carried by another creature, or use thieves' tools to pick locks and disarm traps at range without being noticed.
